Quote: What, me worry?
I finally got rid of that rabbit... now who's next?
Thou art mere mortals... insignificant to my kind. Dost thou dare rival me?
Would you like to enjoy a fresh cup of java before I win this next game?
The first time you say my name, nuthin'. The second time, still nuthin'. Third time and here I am... now whatcha gonna do?
I sure hope you didn't bring a deck of cards to a gunfight.
Just serving up my last opponent with a side of fries... I'll be right with you.
I hope you brought your swimsuit...
I'm the fastest, you'll never get away from me!
Just one touch... and your soul is mine!
You shouldn't anger an artificially-flavored spirit.
Yup, I'm a beaver... but my overbite is sexy!
Quiver in fear, for my deck is never soggy.
Avast ye Lubber, I'll win with me good eye tied behind me back.
Unga Bunga... me win complex card game with pretty pictures.
Pay me no mind during the game... almost as if I wasn't there.
Have you seen my Mommy? She won't like it if you win.
Join with me... you do not know the power of the small side.
I may be cute, but I'm a true harbinger of death.
Ha... ha... Ha, ha... Ha, Ha... Ha, Ha, Ha... HA, HA, HA, HAHAHAHAHAHA!
Yes, come sit by the calm, inviting pool... it'll be the last thing you ever do.
You don't look so tough... winning this will be child's play.
I am the Demon Incarnate who wallows within this infernal darkness... and I hunger.
Always keep your calm and never allow rage to unbalance you... this is the key to certain victory.
Oh no, here they come. Hide, everyone, hide!
My chocolatey taste will lay you to waste!
Hate, Kill, Maim, Hurt, Destroy... TeeHee!
I have existed since time immemorial... none shall ever escape me.
Well, you look yummy... are you my new chew toy?
RAWR!
Don't you dare conceed the game... take your punishment like a man!
COWer before my dreaded deck of dairy doom!
C'mon, let's play a game or two... then you'll know what I'm smilin' about.
This game is highly logical. Therefore, victory shall be mine.
You bore me... insult yourself.
I'm everywhere... you can never hide from me.
Well, those last two were kinda stringy, but tasty... what, are you next?
I'm everyone's favorite clay-boy... here to kick your butt in a game of Magic!
Why am I grinning? Because I'm always happy to meet my next victim.
You dare to challenge me?! I will devour your soul!
Hello Loser.
Look out! I was self-taught by The Hong Kong Book of Magic-Fu.
You've stumbled into my domain now, weakling... you'll not escape alive!
Hope you have a power pellet or this will be over quickly.
Living... Dead... is there really a difference?
My hand isn't bad... it was just drawn that way.
I'm tired of being such a soft, squishy little push-over... prepare to die!
Are you with Panther Claw? Don't lie to me... I'll get you now!
What? You want me to save the universe again?
Oh Yea! Cool, sweet, refreshing and dangerous.
Like, you can't beat me daddy. Give up now, dig?
Laugh at me 'cause I'm tiny, will you? I will have my revenge!
Ooooo... you make me so mad!
This is where you learn what a major deal a minor devil can be.
I am the Door Opener, Knowledge Giver, and Doer of Things Undone... I have created a Manalink to this magical realm.
I will expose you for the coward that you really are.
I am dreaded and cursed. All fear my visage. Some may claim to have written the book of evil... I AM the Book of Evil!
I can see by your lack of fear that you've never faced a Master Artificer... now you shall learn.
You don't stand a chance against my mad skillz... I gotta believe!
Prepare to MEAT your demise pork-eater!
Down every alley... around every corner... I will find you.
Oh, you're really in hot water now! You don't stand a chance against me... even if I am a girl.
I don't even like Magic the Gathering... I'm only playing so that I can watch you lose.
I'm far too swift for you... conceed my victory and save yourself future embarrasment.
I control forces far beyond your comprehension... face me at your peril!
As soon as I finish this potion, I'll show you just how masterful an apprentice can be!
I'm just finishing with my last opponent... do you have a napkin?
No matter how hard you try, you can never avoid... The Noid!
I don't wish to name my next victim, so I'll just point.
With a winning deck for you to fear... Underdog is here!
I will see to it that you never win another game of Magic again... Mwa ha ha ha!
Betcha never though you'd see ME here, did ya?
It isn't true that a cat has nine lives... I'm on my tenth life now.
Braaaaains... winner gets to eat braaaaains.
